title: BBC Sound of 2026 shortlist: 10 acts you'll be obsessed with next year
description: The list tips new music for the coming year, following previous winners like Adele, Haim and Chappell Roan.
content:
This year's list was compiled from votes by an international panel of more than 170 industry experts and artists including Sir Elton John, Dua Lipa, Jade, Olivia Dean, Yungblud and Sam Smith.
It is open to acts who have yet to score a number one albu... [654 chars]

title: Deputy PM David Lammy set to announce jury trial reforms
description: The changes will restrict the right to a jury trial in a bid to reduce the backlog of cases.
content:
The government is set to announce plans to restrict the right to a jury trial in England and Wales in an attempt to turn around unprecedented backlogs and delays in justice.
David Lammy, the deputy prime minister and justice secretary, will lay out t... [2522 chars]

title: OBR head's resignation leaves potential landmines for Reeves
description: Chancellor's next mission to find a respected and credible economist to run the OBR will require careful balance
content:
The shock resignation came for a very specific reason, but the OBR saga will continue with a series of decisions the chancellor will have to make over Richard Hughes' replacement.

title: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold announced with a 10-inch screen and 3.9mm thin design
description: The next era of folding phones is here
content:
🔵 Samsung just announced its next major foldable phone

title: The 15 best and worst Xbox 360 games that defined a generation
description: The Xbox 360 has turned 20 years old, as we celebrate Gears Of War, Call Of Duty, Halo 3, Fable 2, and the less beloved Kinect Star Wars.
content:
For the Xbox 360’s 20th anniversary, GameCentral reflects on the console’s most influential games and how their impact is still felt today.
